content.newsInsight: Xi's military purges just exposed China's nuclear anxiety. Everyone's debating arsenal size. Wrong variable. When you're firing generals who oversee nukes, you're not worried about warheads. You're worried about who has the keys.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: Xi's nuclear force purges, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: if you can't trust your own generals with nukes, how do you signal deterrence to enemies who know you don't trust your own command?
